item.title: 1025 HBAN
item.description: score:1025 Chances: The appointment of Marcy Hingst as General Counsel could bring valuable expertise to the Executive Leadership Team and enhance legal activities for the company. Huntington Bancshares beating Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit and strong demand for commercial loans may boost investor confidence.
